text: Very good doctor. Listens well and assesses your condition patiently. Punctuality has improved a lot over the years. No longer have to wait for a long period. If worried can give clinic a call to check if doctor in before dropping by.
Both doctor n staff are kind and polite. medicine collection and payment process is fast and staff explained in details. If worried about long queue, just call before going down.

Opens at 2pm doctor arrives at 3pm but the Doctor is one of a kind, he goes out of the room to greet and call the patients in. Speaks with enthusiasm and makes you feel better in an instant with all the positivity he gives.

A polyclinic for people who want to receive affordable healthcare. It will be heavily subsidies for Singapore citizen and especially kids! Do remember to download their app to book an appointment, else you might have to wait for 4 to 5 hours before a doctor is available to you.

Apparently those that got symptoms are not allowed in the consultation room, and this is the reason why i got turn away. Probably one of the funniest reason i heard. Give a feeling they are turning patient away just because is closing soon.
